Title: Proletarians of the world, unite to oppose our common enemy!
Publisher: Anhui renmin chubanshe (安徽人民出版社)
Notes: The large figures represent Latin America, Asia and Africa: the three continents that should liberate themselves from Western Imperialism. The statue represents capitalism/imperialism; the figure holds a bomb and handcuffs. The text on the statue: Overthrow American imperialism!The poster is quite similar to another design by Wen Bing from the same year, but published by another publisher.
